contextId.occurrenceNote: The understood subject may be supplied. Alternate translation: "the things that will happen in the future" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: that will happen in the future

contextId.occurrenceNote: The understood verb may be supplied. Alternate translation: "much more than any other king had" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
"a large amount." It is understood that this refer to profit gained. Alternate translation: "two handfuls of profit" or "a large amount of profit" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
It is understood that this refers to people dying. Alternate translation: "the sinner will die ... the man who fears to make an oath will die" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: will the sinner ... will the man who fears to make an oath
